To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private SeparatingLines _separatinglines;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_separatinglines = SeparatingLines(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_separatinglines.IsReady)
{
    var period = _separatinglines.Period.Value;
    var current = _separatinglines.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.separatinglines = self.SeparatingLines(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.separatinglines.IsReady:
    period = self.separatinglines.Period.Value
    current = self.separatinglines.Current.Value
